post:
Greetings Everyone!

We are happy to announce that we have discounted all of our KVM Linux VPS Plans using LET coupon code : BFRIDAY17LET

** Coupon applies to Three & Six month payment plans only **  

[UPDATE - Discount Recurring ]

All Servers are owned and managed internally and we are offering hosting from Cape Town or Johannesburg South Africa.

We accept payment using Credit Card, Paypal & Bitcoin.

[About Us]

Hosting Since 2010

Telasera was established in 2010 to meet the growing demand for reliable South African hosting services. We are a web hosting and IT services company based out of Cape Town, South Africa with hosting locations in both Cape Town and Johannesburg.

https://www.telasera.com/linux-vps
